pkgmetadata.longdescription: Practical 'R' Packaging in 'Docker' // Streamline the creation of 'Docker' images with 'R' packages and dependencies embedded. The 'pracpac' package provides a 'usethis'-like interface to creating Dockerfiles with dependencies managed by 'renv'. The 'pracpac' functionality is described in Nagraj and Turner (2023) doi:10.48550/arXiv.2303.07876.
